description: Supply and Delivery of Dust Collection Equipment
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Solicitation Details

* **Tender Title (English)**: RFP for Dust Collection Equipment Systems
* **Tender Title (French)**: Demande de Propositions pour les Systèmes d’Équipement de Dépoussiérage
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4423085191
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: May 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User

* **End User**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* **End User Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notice Details

* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19842892?extsite=MTk4NDI4OTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contact Person**: Purnima Kaul (she/her)
* **Contact Email**: purnima.kaul@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a Dust Collection Equipment system. The system must comply with the following specifications:

* One (1) 3’ x 8’ Wet Downdraft Table
* One (1) HEPA Afterfilter with frame
* One (1) Wet Dust Collector, Stainless steel

In addition to the above, the selected supplier must also provide after-sales
